thread.title: Will the Academy — and the Internet — Ever Forgive PwC for Its Oscars Flub?
thread.title_full: Will the Academy — and the Internet — Ever Forgive PwC for Its Oscars Flub?

author: Martha C. White
title: Will the Academy — and the Internet — Ever Forgive PwC for Its Oscars Flub?
text: Horowitz holds up the winner card saying best picture winner 'Moonlight' with actor Warren Beatty and host Jimmy Kimmel. Kimmel had come forward to inform the cast that "Moonlight" had indeed won, showing the inside of the envelope as proof. "I knew I would screw this up," said Kimmel, a first-time host.
